video_title: Therapist Tells You How to Stop Living in the Past
transcript:
so when you actually accept what it
helps you do is sit in the present and
then actually look forward to the future
in a positive way whereas learned
helplessness is all about making an
assumption about the future that makes
you not act today and this is what's
really confusing about acceptance is a
lot of people think okay if I accept
that I failed out of college doesn't
that mean that I don't do anything no
actually the opposite so when you accept
that you failed College okay here I am
now I failed out of college what am I
going to do about it where do I go from
here and then there's a natural tendency
to start like looking to the Future in
sort of a positive way but even looking
to the future is not about looking out
here it's about okay what can I do now
what's the first step that I can take
that'll help me like put my life
together
